name: Enable encryption at rest for AWS Glue ETL jobs
description: Ensure that AWS Glue ETL jobs have encryption at rest enabled using AWS Key Management Service (KMS) Customer Managed Keys (CMK). This applies to job outputs, job bookmarks, and shuffle data.

name: Enable encryption at rest for AWS Glue development endpoints
description: Ensure that AWS Glue development endpoints have encryption at rest enabled using AWS Key Management Service (KMS) Customer Managed Keys (CMK). This applies to data stored in the development endpoint.

name: Enable metadata encryption for AWS Glue Data Catalog
description: Ensure that metadata encryption is enabled for the AWS Glue Data Catalog using AWS Key Management Service (KMS) Customer Managed Keys (CMK).

name: Enable password encryption for AWS Glue Data Catalog connections
description: Ensure that password encryption is enabled for AWS Glue Data Catalog connections to protect sensitive connection information.

name: Enable encryption at rest for AWS Glue Machine Learning transforms
description: Ensure that AWS Glue Machine Learning transforms have encryption at rest enabled using AWS Key Management Service (KMS) Customer Managed Keys (CMK).

name: Enable encryption for AWS Glue development endpoints CloudWatch logs
description: Ensure that CloudWatch logs for AWS Glue development endpoints are encrypted using AWS Key Management Service (KMS) Customer Managed Keys (CMK).

name: Enable SSL for AWS Glue database connections
description: Ensure that SSL connections are enabled for AWS Glue database connections to encrypt data in transit.

name: Enable encryption for AWS Glue ETL jobs CloudWatch logs
description: Ensure that CloudWatch logs for AWS Glue ETL jobs are encrypted using AWS Key Management Service (KMS) Customer Managed Keys (CMK).

name: Restrict public access to AWS Glue Data Catalogs
description: Ensure that AWS Glue Data Catalogs are not publicly accessible by implementing appropriate resource-based policies that restrict access to only authorized AWS accounts or IAM principals.

name: Associate security configurations with AWS Glue components
description: Ensure that all AWS Glue components (jobs, crawlers, and development endpoints) have appropriate security configurations associated with them to enforce encryption settings.

name: Implement least privilege access for AWS Glue resources
description: Ensure that IAM policies for AWS Glue resources follow the principle of least privilege, granting only the necessary permissions to authorized entities for performing specific tasks.

name: Enable AWS Glue job bookmarks
description: Enable job bookmarks for AWS Glue ETL jobs to track data that has already been processed, preventing duplicate processing and ensuring data integrity.

name: Use VPC for AWS Glue jobs and development endpoints
description: Configure AWS Glue jobs and development endpoints to run within a Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) to enhance network security and control access to resources.

name: Enable monitoring for AWS Glue jobs
description: Enable CloudWatch metrics and alarms for AWS Glue jobs to monitor job performance, resource utilization, and detect anomalies or failures.

name: Implement proper error handling and logging for AWS Glue jobs
description: Ensure that AWS Glue jobs implement proper error handling and logging mechanisms to capture and report issues for troubleshooting and auditing purposes.
